title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (2 reds, black and purple) applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue brushed over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 35.5 x 81 cm (14 x 31 7/8 in.)
description: Flowering vines and floral clusters. Indian adaption of a European woven fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (2 reds, black and purple) applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue brushed over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-23.
